attributes.action: Stop Expansion of Caterton to the East
attributes.additional_details:
We oppose the further development of the Carterton, Oxfordshire EAST site, which will effectively infill the land between Carterton and Brize Norton Village.

All available evidence demonstrates clearly that the suggested development of the Carterton EAST site is unsustainable and not desired by either the of the communities of Carterton or Brize Norton.

There are other much preferred options available if further development is compulsory,
